skillTree.name: Giant Wolf
skillTree.description: The larger wolves are bred by the Hobgoblins to pull their ramshackle chariots, and be mounts for their cruel Bosses and nasty Shamans.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Bloodthirsty Rage
skillTree.description: Gorduz has caught someone trying to cheat him and goes into a fit of rage. Run, if you know what's good for you – as far and as fast as possible!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.name: Hashut's Scales
skillTree.description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.

skillTree.name: Headdress of Zharr
skillTree.description: Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…

skillTree.name: Fated!
skillTree.description: Something is keeping Gorduz alive when he really should be dead in a ditch somewhere …or at least that's how it appears to literally *everyone* else.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Lucky!
skillTree.description: To say Gorduz has been a lucky git would be something of an understatement.

skillTree.name: Sneaky!
skillTree.description: Like all Hobgoblins, only better, Gorduz is above all else, a cunning little git with lashings of low cunning and a beguiling level of stealth at his disposal.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for Gorduz, Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Attribute: Stalk for Gorduz, Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: The Stabbiest
skillTree.description: By virtue of his considerable experience, Gorduz is the stabbiest of all da stabberz. No question.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Hobgoblin units
	(all units in army)

Unit experience gain: +100% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Stick 'Em!
skillTree.description: "Stick 'em wiv arrers'. Stick 'em with knives, 'an swords, and spears. Stick 'em quick and stick 'em where it 'urts. But most of all, stick 'em when they's looking the other way."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +8 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +16% for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Shoot 'Em!
skillTree.description: Much has already been said about Gorduz' ability to stay alive, but let's not forget that he is also a formidable shooter, for a Hobgoblin, with a dead-eyed stare.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +25% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +8% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Ammunition: +33% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +12% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

Ammunition: +50% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +15% for Hobgoblin  and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Dodge 'Em!
skillTree.description: Whether it be a sea of arrows, crackling blasts of magical energy or deadly war machines, being light on his feet has helped keep Gorduz and Da Gitz hold the lines against all comers.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +5% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +15% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +9 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Missile resistance: +25% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Get 'Em!
skillTree.description: One of the factors in Gorduz' otherwise inexplicable longevity is his sheer, unrelenting aggression in the face of the enemy... or anyone, for that matter.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +15 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +10% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +20% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Charge bonus: +25 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +30% for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Get Tha Gitz!
skillTree.description: "It's clear to me that vis is somefing Da Boyz can't deal wiv on their own – time for Da Gitz!"

ui_effects.description: Summons a unit of Hobgoblin Cutthroats

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 4%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Building
skillTree.description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.name: Distrustful Disposition
backgroundSkills.description: Continually cheating death is an inspiring and not at all frustrating sight for the rabble of Hobgoblins in the Dawi-Zharr's service.

effects.description:
Global recruitment duration: -1 turns for Hobgoblin and Hobgoblin Wolf Raider units
	(factionwide)

Leadership: +6 for Hobgoblins and Hobgoblin Wolf Raiders units
	(Hero's army)
